初遇.encontent:
Who's in front of you?Humph! The Admired Captain, The
 Coolest Radio DJ, The Genius Alchemist! Humph! Call
 me whatever you like.
初遇.content:
在你面前的是谁？哼哼，受人景仰的船长、最酷的电台骑
师、天才炼金术师！随便怎么称呼我都行。

箱中气候.encontent:
Marvy! Look, isn't the sun in the sky shining like
 a record?
箱中气候.content:
啧啧，真不错！你瞧，天上的太阳难道不像一块闪闪发亮
的唱片吗？

致未来.encontent:
Pirates may lose their job, but who cares ... Rock
 'n' Roll!
致未来.content: 海盗也许会失业，但无论如何——摇滚万岁！

孑立.encontent:
It's a bit too quiet ... I'd say, how about some rockabilly
 music?
孑立.content: 有点太安静了——要我说，来几首山地摇滚怎么样？

问候.encontent: Oh oh oh! Watch out, mate ...

朝晨.encontent:
News, or rock music? Which is the best to wake you
 up? Welcome to the Pirate Radio. Let's get it on,
 today and every day, Rock N Roll!
朝晨.content:
新闻，还是摇滚乐？谁更合适来唤醒你的一天——？欢迎
来到海盗电台。让我们开始今天，开始关于摇滚的每一天
！

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Are you staying here all day today? How about having
 fun with the Pirate?
信任-朝晨.content:
你打算今天一整天都呆在这儿？要不，跟本海盗去找点乐
子？

夜暮.encontent:
When you're sailing on the sea,there's a record player, there's
 Dr. Pepper, and there are enough good records. All the stars
 will be your audience ... And they will never complain!
夜暮.content:
当你航行在海上。有唱片机，有胡椒博士也有足够多的好
唱片。所有星星都能看你开演唱会……而且它们从不会抱
怨！

信任-夜暮.encontent:
Hey! I'd say, let's play that record, the one we all
 like.
信任-夜暮.content: 嘿！我说，让我们听那张唱片吧，我们都喜欢的那张。

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
Berets, sun hats, casquettes, and captain hats.Hats protect me
 against the wind and the rain, as well as the cold and the heat.Regulus
 loves hats, and also loves not wearing a hat.
帽檐与发鬓.content:
贝雷帽、遮阳帽、鸭舌帽和船长帽，遮风又挡雨，乘凉又
避暑。星锑喜欢帽子，但也喜欢不戴帽子的时候。

袖与手.encontent: What do you want? I don't have any spare scratch.
袖与手.content: 干嘛？我手上可没有多余的闲钱了。

衣着与身形.encontent:
Now? You can wear anything now! Even if you want to
 wear a paper bag tomorrow, it doesn't matter ... 
 This is the Swinging Sixties!
衣着与身形.content:
现在？现在穿什么的都有！即使你明天想穿着纸袋上门也
无所谓——这就是摇摆年代！

嗜好.encontent:
Drift on the sea. Go on a radio spree. Attack all the
 new things. Forever and ever!
嗜好.content:
在海上漂流，在电台狂欢，向所有的新玩意发起进攻，直
到永远！

赞赏.encontent:
Have you thought about being a Rock DJ at Radio APPLe?
 You will be a great DJ only second to me!
赞赏.content:
你考虑过来APPLe电台当一名摇滚骑师吗？你会成为
一名仅次于本海盗的伟大骑师的！

亲昵.encontent:
Have you ever been to a live show? The rock music from the radio
 is great, but it's completely different to have a live rock
 show! Of course, the ticket price will also go up ... Can you
 dig it?
亲昵.content:
你去过现场演唱会吗？虽然电台里的摇滚乐也很棒，但在
现场听摇滚，可是截然不同的感受！当然啦，票价也会随
之上涨——你明白我的意思吧？

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
I've heard of a technique that can control the frequency. So
 that all the radio stations will receive your message ... Rock
 music will be broadcast on the radios of the officials who hate
 rock. Haha, it's a gas!
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
我听说有一种技术能够控制频率。让所有电台都收到你的
消息……音乐从那些讨厌摇滚的官员们的收音机里传出来
。哈哈哈，天大的乐子！

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
If it had not been the annoying "shadows," APPLe could
 have sailed longer on the Thames.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
没有那些惹人厌的“跟屁虫”的话，APPLe号还能在
泰晤士河上转一会呢。

独白.encontent:
The past, the future. Some may remember; some may not.
 But the brave legends, adventures, rock music and
 its spirit will be immortal!
独白.content:
过去，未来。有人或许记得，有人或许不记得。但是勇敢
的传说、冒险、摇滚乐和它的精神永恒不朽！

入队.encontent: Wait, I have to hide the records first!
入队.content: 等一会，我得先把唱片藏好！

择选高阶咒语.encontent: Everybody, let me see your hands up!
择选高阶咒语.content: 所有人，让我看见你们的双手！

择选至终的仪式.encontent: Are you ready to be blinded?
择选至终的仪式.content: 准备好被亮瞎眼睛了吗？

释放神秘术Ⅰ.encontent: Left hands up, now, right hands up!
释放神秘术Ⅰ.content: 抬起左手，现在，抬起右手！

召唤至终的仪式.content: 还有人没打算蹦起来吗？

受敌Ⅱ.encontent: Peace and love, peace and love!

洞悉.encontent:
How much are these materials? And how many records
 can I buy?Ah! No, I definitely do not mean to steal
 a few! Really!
洞悉.content:
这些材料能换多少钱，又能买几张唱片呢？啊！不，我绝
对没有偷偷藏几个走的意思啊！真的！

洞悉之底.encontent:
The roaring engine of the motor, the rocking music from the radio,
 the waves when the ship sets sail. Everything and everything.
 I can't wait to feel the new world!
洞悉之底.content:
机车轰鸣的引擎，电台音乐的震声，游轮下水的波涛。一
切的一切，我已经等不及感受新世界了！
